# Edward J. Zajac

}}
Edward J. Zajac is James F. Ber√© Distinguished Professor of Management and Organizations at the Kellogg School of Management, Northwestern University.
In 2012 the Free University of Berlin gave him an honorary doctorate "for his pioneering work in the areas of corporate governance and strategic alliances".
